name: pennant
readme: # Pennant Argument parser for Zig. ## Features - Opposite flags (`--foo`/`--no-foo`, `--uppercase`/`--lowercase`), which act on a single variable and are mutually exclusive - Values with and without equals sign (`--foo bar` and `--foo=bar` are both valid and equivalent) - Bool flags never take a value, non-bool flags always do - Shorthands for bool flags - Everything is defined in a single struct, with the power of Zig's `comptime` ## Examples Examples are available in the `examples` folder. They can also be run via `zig build example-[name]`.
owner_bio: Low-level Zig programmer that loves kernel and compiler development
